name: i-am-request
description: Represents a BACnet I-Am service request, used by a device to announce its presence on the network and advertise its capabilities.

fields.name: i-am-device-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier of the device making the announcement.

fields.name: max-apdu-length-accepted
fields.description: The maximum APDU length in octets that this device can accept.

fields.name: segmentation-supported
fields.description: The level of segmentation support provided by this device.

fields.name: vendor-id
fields.description: The vendor identifier assigned to the manufacturer of this device.
